creditline: Gift of Dr. George T. Shea and Gordon Locksley
description: white dog standing on all four paws; upright short tail; round red nose
text: Nara's sculpture Your Dog embodies both a child's loving playmate and a menacing creature, larger than life. Its huge scale reminds viewers how the world looks through the eyes of a child. True to the spirit of Pop Art, Nara's work is shown in museums and galleries and sold as T-shirts and children's books, attracting a large variety of fans around the world, from fine-art collectors to commercial consumers.
title: Your Dog
